name: Dandelion - Wishes brought to you -
summary:
Included in the premium package version of the game.

BGM directed and composed by Team Bubble Booster (Sanhwa Lee, Ari, Vivid, Yoo k.h)

OP 'Yet I can't stay' [01, 24]
Composition/Arrangement: Ari
Lyrics: Sanhwa Lee, Cheritz
Vocals: Ilhwan Choi
Guitar: MACARONI☆
Bass: Hyunmo Kim (H.J.Freaks)
Drums: Jungho Kim

ED '너에게 부는 바람' (Wishes brought to you) [23, 25]
Composition/Arrangement: Vivid
Lyrics: Vivid, Cheritz
Vocals: Honey
Guitar: Kyungho Sohn
Bass: Yoo k.h
info:
• 别名: 덴더라이언 - 너에게 부는 바람 -
  • 发售日期: 2012-11-30
  • 碟片数量: 1
